title: [Patreon Preview] The Mexican Spiny Lobster
itunes:title: [Patreon Preview] The Mexican Spiny Lobster
description:
This week, we're joined by ABC's Shark Tank alum and co-owner of Cousins Maine Lobster, Jim Tselikis. In this episode, Jack talks about weird jobs around the world, Jim pitches the concept of Golf, and everyone gives Luis sh*t for not knowing where to find a lobster.

Subscribe at Patreon.com/IDKAT

Tiers start at $2 a month and come with perks ranging from ad-free IDKAT episodes, exclusive After Show episodes, and other bonus content!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
